chapter.title: Skill requirements
chapter.para: Before you begin working through this guide, it is important to understand your individual use case for your OpenStack deployment. We recommend reading this guide with the following questions in mind:

listitem.para: What problem am I trying to solve?
How does this solve my problem?
How do I want to implement my SUSE OpenStack Cloud?

chapter.para: OpenStack is comprised of numerous projects that develop the services that can make up your OpenStack cloud.
Depending on your use case requirements, each service provides a different function. However, this guide is focusing on a PoC implementation and describes the use of the following projects:
This guide also uses SUSE Enterprise Storage (SES), powered by Ceph, as a software based storage solution on the backend. For more documentation on SES, see SUSE Enterprise Storage 5 for the latest.
